metadata.synopsis: One liner for the female half of the Lovers in the Park vignette.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Talk to the female half of the Lovers in the LOW Park at ~ -105, 31, -37 in CTY_Main_A

0.speaker: Eugenie Kenridge
0.text: You know, this park used to be a lovely spot for some peace and quiet. Alone. I suppose everything changes, eventually...

1.speaker: Eugenie Kenridge
1.text: I'm sorry for Wendel, he does get a touch, ah, over-effusive about our courtship. Pay him no heed.

2.speaker: Eugenie Kenridge
2.text: Gods, I thought at least this park would be safe. I suppose nowhere is, these days. Not really.
